_header: Will ye hear a wonder thing
_description: Dialogue between the Devil and a Maid — twenty-two couplets

BodRawD328.First Lines:
Wol ȝe here a wonder thyngBe twyxt a mayd & þe fovle
                    fendeThys spake þe fend to þe maydBe leue on me mayd to
                    day…
BodRawD328.Last Lines:
…Now thu fende styl thu beNell ich speke no more with
                    the
